mapper.insert: INSERT INTO skd_sel_test_scnrio ( scnrio_num , eff_end_dtm , audit_num , audit_dtm , scnrio_nm , op_typ_cd , scnrio_desc , seq_num , src_cd , eff_sta_dtm ) SELECT IFNULL(MAX(ssts.scnrio_num) + 1, 1) AS scnrio_num , '9999-12-31 23:59:59' AS eff_end_dtm , #{user_num} AS audit_num , NOW() AS audit_dtm , #{scnrio_nm} AS scnrio_nm , #{op_typ_cd} AS op_typ_cd , #{scnrio_desc} AS scnrio_desc , #{seq_num} AS seq_num , #{src_cd} AS src_cd , #{eff_sta_dtm} AS eff_sta_dtm FROM skd_sel_test_scnrio ssts
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(ssts.scnrio_num) AS scnrio_num FROM skd_sel_test_scnrio ssts
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO skd_sel_test_case ( scnrio_num , case_num , eff_end_dtm , audit_num , audit_dtm , case_nm , case_desc , seq_num , eff_sta_dtm ) SELECT IFNULL(MAX(ssts.scnrio_num) + 1, 1) AS scnrio_num , #{case_num} , '9999-12-31 23:59:59' AS eff_end_dtm , #{user_num} AS audit_num , NOW() AS audit_dtm , #{case_nm} AS scnrio_nm , #{case_desc} AS scnrio_desc , #{seq_num} AS seq_num , #{eff_sta_dtm} AS eff_sta_dtm FROM skd_sel_test_scnrio ssts
